== Dwaranakunte (610266) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Dwaranakunte is a village in the [[Sira ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 621.81 hectares and harbouring 433 households with total population of 1851 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Sira]] is at a distance of 32 km. Male population is 973 and female population is 878. Scheduled Caste Population is 256 and Scheduled Tribes population is 156. Census Location Code of the village is 610266<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 1214 (65.59%)
* Literate male population: 726 (74.61%)
* Literate female population: 488 (55.58%)
